name: Ninja Hattori-3D
description:
An open-world game based on my favourite cartoon that made my childhood. You can roam around and enjoy an open-world game in your android phone.

The Game Has Some Major Bugs :(

The controls are simple

 •  On-screen joystick to move

• On-screen action buttons

Features

 • Supports Android 5.1 and above

Download Instructions

•  Download the file

•  Go to your mobile's download s folder

•  Click on the downloaded folder named 'Ninja Hattori 3D - Open World Game.apk'

•  Install it

•  Open it

•  Enjoy...

Game info

Version:     1.0

Size(expanded):     195MB

RAM Required:     4GB or more

RAM Recommended:     6GB or more

Author:     Yash Raj

Published on:     01 Jul 2022

Game Permissions

Nope, no permissions are required....
